name: Ludum Dare 48 - Deep trouble in Little town?
name_original: Ludum Dare 48 - Deep trouble in Little town?
description:
This is is for Ludum dare 48th game jam! 

For Ludum dare this was for a Comp entry but changed to Jam.

Description:

You've just arrived at your new station in Little town as a delivery service.

Your have a client  and is waiting at the other end of town.

Controls:

Tab/esc = Pause menu

W/A/S/D  = move

Left shift = run

Mouse left click =  interact/talk

There is no audio in the game.
